name: SleepingSoundsRelax,StudyorMeditate
0:
”Alexa, open sleeping sounds”
”Alexa, ask sleeping sounds to play flute”
”Play the audio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleeping sounds
des:
With nearly 1/3rd of the American population suffering from sleep deprivation, low concentration of students towards more valuable things and living in a fast and busy city life has made everything hectic with no time to relax.
This skill will help you rejuvenate the soul, mind, and body. 
These theme songs are played in a way that they will help you lighten your brain and help you sleep better or even help you in better concentration. Some of the sounds are composed by sleep the therapists and psychiatrists.
So, just try them out and if you like what you listen, make sure to leave a review and a rating. 

Currently, there are 14 different sounds:
to begin the playlist just say "Alexa, open sleeping sounds"
Or to open a particular sound, say "Alexa, ask sleeping sounds to play <Name_of_the_sound>

Names of the sounds are:
1. Fire
2. Crystal 
(Sound of Chinese Crystal Bowl)
3. Flute
4. Car Journey
5. Underwater
6. Whale
7. Wind
(Windchime sound)
8. Birds
9. Waterfall
10. Rainfall
11. Universe
12. Rain on roof
13. Ocean
14. Meditation
(Om Sound)

Try them out!
Make a request for more relaxing sounds at apooos3@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
